name: Unreal Simple Shooter
description:
Summary

This project is the end result of an online course I followed learning Unreal Engine C++. There are currently no additions than what the course provided, but I do plan on coming back to this project to add extra features for learning purposes in the future.

There are currently no in-game menus, so the only way to quit/close the game is press Alt and F4 on your keyboard. 

Controls

Both keyboard and gamepad controls are supported:

  • Move
    • WASD
    • Left Stick
  • Shoot
    • Left-Click
    • Right Trigger
  • Jump
    • Spacebar
    • A (Xbox Controller)
  • Quit
    • Alt + F4
